# Transcripts

This folder contains transcribed text files generated by the Whisper model.

## File format:
- Input: Audio files from the `audio/` folder
- Output: `.txt` files with the same name as the source audio file
- Encoding: UTF-8
- Language: Russian (configured in the script)

## Generated files:
The transcription script will create `.txt` files here with the transcribed text from corresponding audio files.
